briefdescription.para: Service request events for the DIV and CORDIC modules.
This typedef is used for Output Data representation in blocking & non-blocking functions. XMC_MATH_Q0_11_t => 1 Signed bit, 0 Integer bits, 11 fraction bits.
This typedef is used for Input and Output Data representation in blocking & non-blocking functions. XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t => 1 Signed bit, 0 Integer bits, 23 fraction bits.
This typedef is used for Output Data representation in blocking & non-blocking functions. XMC_MATH_Q1_22_t => 1 Signed bit, 1 Integer bits, 22 fraction bits.
This typedef is used for Input Data representation in blocking & non-blocking functions. XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t => 1 Signed bit, 8 Integer bits, 15 fraction bits.

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Clears the requested event.
DIV & CORDIC unit's event (end of calculation & error) is cleared by setting bit-fields of EVFCR register.

parameterdescription.para: Value representing the proportion of the x-coordinate (XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format)
Value representing the proportion of the y-coordinate (XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format)

simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the principal value arc tangent of an angle of y/x expressed in radians. The input radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format.

This function programs CORDIC as circular mode. CORDY register is programmed with input y and CORDX register is programmed with input x. Most significant 24 bits of CORRZ register returns the result of the operation.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

parameterdescription.para: Value representing the proportion of the x-coordinate (XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format)
Value representing the proportion of the y-coordinate (XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format)

simplesect.para: None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the principal value arc tangent of an angle of y/x expressed in radians. The input radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q8_15_t format. Call XMC_MATH_CORDIC_GetArcTanResult() API to get the result.
This function programs CORDIC as circular mode. CORDY register is programmed with input y and CORDX register is programmed with input x.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_GetArcTanResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the cosine for an angle in radians angle_in_radians. The input angle in radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format.

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & circular mode. Configures CORDZ register with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_CIRCULAR_GAIN_IN_Q023. Most significant 24 bits of CORRX register returns the result of the operation.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Sin(), XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Tan()
XMC_MATH_Q1_22_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the hyperbolic cosine for an angle in radians angle_in_radians. The input angle in radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format.

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & hyperbolic mode. Configures CORDZ register with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_HYPERBOLIC_GAIN_IN_Q1_22. Most significant 24 bits of CORRX register returns the result of the operation.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Sinh(), XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Tanh()

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & hyperbolic mode. Configures CORDZ register with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_HYPERBOLIC_GAIN_IN_Q1_22.

simplesect.title: Note:

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & hyperbolic mode. Configures CORDZ register with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_HYPERBOLIC_GAIN_IN_Q1_22.

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the sine for an angle in radians angle_in_radians. The input angle in radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format. Call XMC_MATH_CORDIC_GetSinResult() API to get the result.
This function programs CORDIC to rotation & circular mode. Configures CORDZ register with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_CIRCULAR_GAIN_IN_Q023.

XMC_MATH_Q0_11_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the tangent for an angle in radians angle_in_radians. The input angle in radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format.

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & circular mode. Chains the results of Cosine (CORRX) and Sine (CORRY) as a dividend and divisor by configuring GLBCON register. CORDZ register is programmed with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_CIRCULAR_GAIN_IN_Q023. Most significant 24 bits of CORRY register returns the result of the operation.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Sin(), XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Cos()
XMC_MATH_Q0_11_t

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Computes the hyperbolic tangent for an angle in radians angle_in_radians. The input angle in radians must be in XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format.

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & hyperbolic mode. Chains the results of Cosine (CORRX) and Sine (CORRY) as a dividend and divisor by configuring GLBCON register. CORDZ register is programmed with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_HYPERBOLIC_GAIN_IN_Q1_22. QUOT register returns the result of the operation.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Sinh(), XMC_MATH_CORDIC_Cosh()()
None

simplesect.title: Description:

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & hyperbolic mode. Chains the results of Cosine (CORRX) and Sine (CORRY) as a dividend and divisor by configuring GLBCON register. CORDZ register is programmed with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_HYPERBOLIC_GAIN_IN_Q1_22.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_GetTanhResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()

This function programs CORDIC to rotation & circular mode. Chains the results of Cosine (CORRX) and Sine (CORRY) as a dividend and divisor by configuring GLBCON register. CORDZ register is programmed with input angle_in_radians and CORDX register with gain XMC_MATH_RECIPROC_CIRCULAR_GAIN_IN_Q023.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Loading of CORDX register triggers the start of computation.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_CORDIC_GetTanResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables the Math module by gating the clock.
MATH coprocessor's clock is disabled by setting MATH bit of CGATSET0 register.
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Disables the requested event.
DIV & CORDIC unit's event (end of calculation & error) is disabled by clearing bit-fields of EVIER register.

simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent()

simplesect.para: Returns result of a Signed Division operation.
QUOT register returns the result of Signed Division operation.

RMD register returns the result of Signed Modulo operation.

bool true - if DIV unit is busy false - if DIV unit is not busy

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Utility function to check if the DIV unit is busy.
Divider unit status is determined by reading BSY bit of DIVST register.
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Performs signed integer division and computes quotient of the division. Call XMC_MATH_DIV_GetSignedDivResult() API to get the result.
Divider unit is configured for signed division. DVD & DVS registers are programmed with dividend and divisor values. The division is started with the write to DVS register.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Ensure divisor is smaller than dividend.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_DIV_GetSignedDivResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Performs signed modulo operation and computes remainder of the division. Call XMC_MATH_DIV_GetSignedModResult() API to get the result.
Divider unit is configured for signed division. DVD & DVS registers are programmed with dividend and divisor values. The division is started with the write to DVS register.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Ensure divisor is smaller than dividend.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_DIV_GetSignedModResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Performs unsigned integer division and computes quotient of the division. Call XMC_MATH_DIV_GetUnsignedDivResult() API to get the result.
Divider unit is configured for unsigned division. DVD & DVS registers are programmed with dividend and divisor values. The division is started with the write to DVS register.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Ensure divisor is smaller than dividend.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_DIV_GetUnsignedDivResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Performs unsigned modulo operation and computes remainder of the division. Call XMC_MATH_DIV_GetUnsignedModResult() API to get the result.
Divider unit is configured for unsigned division. DVD & DVS registers are programmed with dividend and divisor values. The division is started with the write to DVS register.

simplesect.title: Note:
simplesect.para: Ensure divisor is smaller than dividend.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_DIV_GetUnsignedModResult(), XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables the Math module by un-gating the clock.
MATH coprocessor's clock is enabled by setting MATH bit of CGATCLR0 register.
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Enables the requested event.
DIV & CORDIC unit's event (end of calculation & error) is enabled by setting bit-fields of EVIER register.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_GetEventStatus(), XMC_MATH_DisableEvent()
bool true - if status is set false - if status is not set

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Returns the status of the requested event.
Status of DIV & CORDIC unit's event (end of calculation & error) status is determined by reading EVFR register.

simplesect.title: Related APIs:
simplesect.para: XMC_MATH_EnableEvent(), XMC_MATH_DisableEvent(), XMC_MATH_SetEvent(), XMC_MATH_ClearEvent()
None

simplesect.title: Description:
simplesect.para: Sets the requested event. This is a software setting for the event.
DIV & CORDIC unit's event (end of calculation & error) is set by setting bit-fields of EVFSR register.

detaileddescription.para: Converts the given number to XMC_MATH_Q0_11_t format
Converts the given number to XMC_MATH_Q0_23_t format

briefdescription.para: MATH Coprocessor (MATH) driver for the XMC1302 microcontroller family

detaileddescription.para: The MATH Coprocessor (MATH) module comprises of two independent sub-blocks to support the CPU in math-intensive computations: a Divider Unit (DIV) for signed and unsigned 32-bit division operations and a CORDIC (COrdinate Rotation DIgital Computer) Coprocessor for computation of trigonometric, linear or hyperbolic functions.

MATH driver features:
CORDIC Coprocessor is used for computation of trigonometric and hyperbolic functions
Supports result chaining between the Divider Unit and CORDIC Coprocessor
All MATH APIs are available in Blocking and non-blocking modes. Non-blocking APIs are suffixed with NB.
32bit signed and unsigned division implementations available for __aeabi_uidiv(), __aeabi_idiv(), __aeabi_uidivmod(), __aeabi_idivmod()
Divider and CORDIC unit busy status can be checked by XMC_MATH_DIV_IsBusy() and XMC_MATH_CORDIC_IsBusy()
Individual APIs available to return the result of each non-blocking MATH function

Note: All non-blocking MATH APIs are not atomic and hence occurence of interrupts during the normal execution of these APIs may lead to erroneous results. User has to exercise caution while using these APIs.
Example: Execution of divide instruction (/) in an ISR during the normal execution of non-blocking APIs may give erroneous results.
